articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Koreans from Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Koreans from Japan

					Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with a congratulatory group of the Korean residents in Japan at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday. The group headed by Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, is here on the 63rd anniversary of DPRK.

articles.title: Message of Greeting to Mexican President
articles.content:
Message of Greeting to Mexican President

					Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Mexican President Felipe Calderon Hinojosa on the 201st anniversary of the country's independence.
					
					The message hoped for greater success in his work for the social progress and economic development, wishing friendly Mexico prosperity.

articles.title: Message of Greeting to Mexican FM
articles.content:
Message of Greeting to Mexican FM

					Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a message of greeting to his Mexican counterpart Patricia Espinosa Cantellano on the 201st anniversary of its independence.
					
					He in the message expressed the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would continue to develop on good terms.
